By completing the requirements for the AFPA Nutritionist Certification - Master Level you will set yourself apart from others by means of the your personal level of educational development, expertise, professionalism and commitment to the nutrition, health and wellness industry. When you have completed all 4 nutrition cetification programs you will recieve the  AFPA Nutrition Consultant - Master Level credential.  

You will gain the education and training that will enable you to combine sound nutrition, safe and effective physical activity, appropriate lifestyle changes and psychological and emotional support into programs that will help you to help them to achieve their goals. All of these components are important and all must be looked at carefully when designing a realistic and reasonable nutritional program. Diet, exercise and lifestyle together are the basis of a complete and well-rounded program.

Description
attrs.value:
Obesity, type 2 diabetes, cardiovascular disease, cholesterol levels and sedentary lifestyles among youth is on the rise.  AFPA is dedicated to making fitness a lifelong habit for our youth thru the development of the AFPA Children's Fitness Specialist Certification course, which goes beyond exercise to promote healthy lifestyle choices and appropriate social behavior.

According to the American Diabetes Association, type 2 diabetes is ever more commonly occurring in overweight children. Statistics indicate that as many as 80 percent of youth may be overweight when diagnosed. Adult health risk factors are appearing in kindergarten to age six populations. These medical conditions have become an epidemic and AFPA is leading the fight by providing educational programming to fitness enthusiasts who are eager help our children toward leading a more healthy life!

The AFPA Children's Fitness Specialist Certification course will show you how to get kids fit and gain self confidence too. It's about giving kids the tools, skills and experience so they can lead a physically active life the rest of their life.

AFPA Certified Children's Fitness Specialist provides a multidisciplinary approach to teaching health-related fitness at the elementary school level. This comprehensive Certified Children's Fitness Specialist course helps practitioners build successful programs that will meet the challenging health demands of the 21st century.

This course is designed to prepare participants to teach safe and effective Cardio Kickboxing exercise programs through the development of leadership and technical skills.

Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Cycle Instructor Certification course is designed for the instructor who wants to expand their teaching capabilities to indoor cycling. This program utilizes various cycling programs' strengths to create a well- rounded cycle instructor who can instruct on any indoor cycle.

Topics include safe and effective cycle class design, cycling techniques for endurance, speed and strength, choreography and example workouts, studio setup & design, and much more!
Cycle Instructor Certification Course Objectives:

    * Identify and explain proper bike setup, riding alignment, and safety considerations.
    * Explain and practice warm ups for stationary indoor cycling.
    * Distinguish basic indoor cycling class techniques and music.
    * Construct and employ different indoor cycle classes.
    * Apply cueing and coaching techniques on and off the bike.
    * Prepare and demonstrate an example of an indoor cycling class.
    * Identify various cycle related injuries and describe how to avoid them.
    * Discuss diet and nutrition requirements for optimal performance.

$395.00

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Functional Training is a system of athletic development that focuses on training the body the way it will be used in competition, making it the most efficient and effective form of training today.

The AFPA Functional Training Specialist Certification course is designed to educate you on the Functional Training protocols to improve total athleticism, enhances performance, and reduces injuries through exercise progressions that will spur development potential for specific movement patterns commonly use in sport.

The AFPA Functional Training Specialist Certification course is a valuable additional credential for all Certified Personal Trainers, Fitness Instructors and those that work with athletes and sports enthusiasts. Expand your services and programs to include functional exercises for beginner, intermediate and advanced clients, and increase your earning potential at the same time!
Functional Exercise Specialist Certification Course Learning Objectives:

    * Develop safe functional exercise progressions based on the unique needs of each client.
    * Describe the benefits of exercise, and the applications to improve the ability to perform activities of daily living.
    * Discuss how non-athletes and athletes can balance upper-body strength and stability.
    * Illustrate lower body strength and balance progressions.
    * Recognize how to restore hip extension flexibility and balance hamstring flexibility.
    * Apply and implement functional exercises to improve overall performance in both athletics and everyday living.
    * Differentiate between exercise variations using equipment commonly found in both the weight room and aerobic studio.
    * Construct a Plyometric training program to increase power while reducing prevention. 

What you will learn:

You will learn how to administer tests to determine where to start, the progressions focus on training for the torso, the upper body, and the lower body. You will learn detailed programs that incorporate the exercises and methods for these progressions. Provided will be 13 sample exercise progressions (six for the upper body, three for the torso, and four for the lower body). Each progression has 17-23 exercises, arranged according to difficulty.

You will also learn why it is important to have a sense of purpose for exercise selection and how functional exercises cross over to enhance the activities of daily living. A progressive functional continuum is presented and reviewed. The AFPA Functional Training Specialist Certification course is applicable for group instructors and personal trainers. Includes sample exercise progressions for upper body, lower body and the core body.

attrs.label: Course Material Price
attrs.value:
$395.00
      Note: Includes all course materials and exam

Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Group Fitness Instructor Certification course is design to teach those that are looking to instruct group fitness oriented classes - aerobics, hi/lo impact, step, circuit, muscle conditioning, interval and other group exercise modalities.

This course is designed to prepare participants to teach safe and effective group exercise programs through the development of leadership and technical skills. Topics covered are anatomy, physiology, kinesiology, care and prevention of aerobic injures, aerobic class design, structure and workout combinations, body sculpting and resistance training with weights and tubing and leadership skills. This course is designed for group fitness instructors who may teach aerobics, step and muscle conditioning classes.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Pilates is the fastest-growing trend in fitness today, with millions enjoying its muscle strengthening and body toning benefits. Pilates has been indorsed by physicians for nearly a century. Pilates is truly the ultimate mind-body exercise for anyone how wants to strengthen, streamline and realign their body! The AFPA Pilates Fitness Instructor Certification - Mat Level I course was designed for fitness professionals who desire to learn more about the teachings of Joseph Pilates and how to implement the teachings into a group or one on one setting.

Top athletes, performers and fitness enthusiasts alike are practicing the Pilates' technique, making it one of the hottest exercise trends for men and women. The teaching techniques you will learn combine key elements of yoga, stress reduction and bodywork. These techniques focus on strengthening the core muscles of the body, while increasing overall flexibility, as well as lengthening, defining and sculpting muscles.

The AFPA Pilates Fitness Instructor Certification - Mat Level I course is designed for individuals who want to instruct beginner and intermediate students. You will learn excellent teaching skills, how to plan a class, how to create confidence in your students and how and when to provide posture corrections. The Pilates Fitness Instructor Certification program is designed to educate participants about the Joseph Pilates techniques and variations, and how to incorporate them into an individual and group setting. This course will enable you to formulate your own personal teaching style.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Pilates Fitness Instructor â Level II (Props) Certification course is designed for instructors who have previous experience with classical Pilates Mat exercises. It is strongly recommended that participants have prior knowledge of anatomy, experience in teaching a related form of movement and/or exercise, as well as have completed the AFPA Pilates Fitness Instructor â Level I (Mat) Certification course, or similar thereof.

Students will learn how to teach the full progression from Beginner to Super Advanced Classical Mat Pilates exercises, inaddition to learning how to incorporate various apparatus. Instructors who pass this course are fully prepared and certified to teach the most popular and effective group and private Pilates training in the world to various populations and those with stability & balance limitations!

In addition, you will be instructed on how to make your Pilates mat class more interesting and enjoyable by introducing accessories that expand your Pilates mat exercises. You will learn the unique characteristics of a variety of props: the Pilates circle, the foam roller, and the elastic exercise band. Learn step by step through photo sequences of specially designed exercises as well as variations on traditional Pilates movements.

If you are considering operating your own Pilates business, you will be introduced to a hands-on approach that tackles issues such as how to make your teaching healthier and more ergonomic for you, how to handle different types of clients, how to juggle the demands of being healer/helper/cashier, and much more. It is packed with information, humor and advice from top studio owners and educators who share their life philosophies and approaches to Pilates.

You will start with the foundation for all the Pilates exercises, then progress to an in-depth treatment of mat work thru challenging exercise sequences. Following mat work, in depth instruction and photo illustrations are applied to the full range of Pilates apparatus: Reformer, Cadillac, Step and ladder barrels, Magic circle, Wunda chair, Ped-a-pul, Arm chair. Teachings regarding the larger Pilates apparatus are so that instructors can become aware of the exercises, form and technique, but not to be tested on this equipment.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Pilates Mat Level I or equivalent

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Learn the skills and knowledge necessary to offer Post Rehabilitation Exercise services to clients and receive the recognition for being on the forefront of health care to your clients and those you serve.

This course will teach you how to develop safe and effective post rehabilitative fitness programs for clients with various limitations that are recovering from a variety of injuries, disease and/or treatments. With proper training and networking capabilities you can take the next step toward receiving a higher hourly income, as well as becoming the potential training company or facility for post rehab patients/clients from area hospitals, physical therapist clinics and Sport and Senior Rehab Centers.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Personal Trainer Certification from Nationally Recognized organization and 400 hours of documented hands on experience

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Pre-Post Exercise Specialist Certification course will provide exercise programs that are safe and effective for those who will be instructing and training the prenatal or postnatal client in a group setting or one on one in the gym or home setting.

This program will provide trainers & fitness specialists with advanced skills and knowledge specific to pre and post natal exercise prescription. Some of the benefits of exercise for pre post natal clients are more energy during pregnancy, reduced stress and anxiety, quicker recovery from birth, fewer complications in pregnancy, shorter labor time & increased self esteem!

Topics include prenatal and postnatal physiology adaptations, musculo-skeletal & metabolic adaptations, maternal responses to acute exercise, fetal responses to acute exercise, aerobic and resistance-training effects in labor and delivery, exercise guidelines for pre/post-partum, nutrient requirements throughout pregnancy.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Sports Conditioning Specialist Certification course presents the principles and practices of a new era of athletic training. Learn to build a conditioning program through testing and building up nine essential fitness components including power, strength, speed, quickness, coordination, agility, flexibility, local muscular endurance, and cardiovascular aerobic capacity and endurance. Next you will learn the training exercises and drills that for the development of sport-specific performance factors. Then you learn how to periodize the training program precisely for peak performance at critical points in the competitive season and how to use safe and effective reconditioning regimens to bring an athlete back from injury.

If you are currently training clients as a Certified Personal Trainer, adding the credentials of Certified Sports Conditioning Specialist will enable you to expand your services and programs to athletes and sports competition enthusiasts, as well as help to increase your earning potential!

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Sports Nutrition Consultant Certification course is perfect for personal trainers, strength trainers, group fitness instructors, athletes of all levels and all associated health practitioners & enthusiasts!

The optimum way for you or your clients to get the most out of their workouts and feel their best is to develop an energizing, performance-enhancing nutrition plan, tailored to their body's specific needs. Do that, and their on track to achieve the higher level of fitness and better overall health that they crave and you receive the recognition of being a superb training. Learn how to enhance your client's workouts and maximize their results with proper nutrition, safe and effective sports supplements, and beneficial vitamins and minerals!

The AFPA Sports Nutrition Consultant Certification program helps students and practitioners obtain the knowledge they need to give sound advice to athletes and active individuals, gain a solid understanding of the principles of nutrition as they relate specifically to sport and learn how to distinguish between fact and fallacy in the confusing world of sport nutrition and supplements.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The AFPA Stability Ball Trainer Certification program was developed to promote safe yet challenging ball exercise to instructors and personal trainers. This program is a hands-on way to learn more about the benefits of using the stability exercise ball. Participants will learn the proper execution, proper progression, teaching techniques and cueing for all the selected exercises. Stability Ball training is a great tool to add to any exercise, conditioning & rehabilitation program.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Strength and Conditioning Trainer Certification course offers an in-depth look at strength training for the upper, lower and core sections of the body; safe and effective personalized training programs for men, women, children, and the elderly; strength and conditioning programs for athletes of all types for various sports at various ages and much more!

Drawing on the latest scientific principles and theories related to resistance training, this program provides the "how" and the "why" behind the proper performance of popular upper-body, lower-body and trunk exercises. By understanding the purpose and correct form for each exercise, you can gain the full benefit each exercise provides and avoid injury. You will also learn the latest information related to resistance training program design, training systems, periodization principles and a continuum of training programs.

Upon completion of the AFPA Certified Strength Trainer course you'll be able to design scientifically sound resistance training programs, modify and adapt programs to meet the needs of special populations, and implement strength building exercise programs design build power and strength.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Trainer of Special Populations Certification Program is nationally and internationally recognized since 1995.  AFPA Trainer of Special Populations graduates are prepared to design & implement effective exercise programs for a variety of populations that range from youth, senior, pre/post pregnancy, and people with disabilities, chronic diseases and multiple conditions.
Trainer of Special Populations Course Learning Objectives:

    * Analyze and implement exercise management programs for over 30 different chronic diseases, disabilities and dysfunctions.
    * Employ exercise protocols within the realm of personal training for metabolic syndrome, stress and anxiety disorder, multiple chronic conditions, fibromyalgia and the other conditions.
    * Examine and integrate a physicians recommendations into your personal training exercise program for clients.
    * Identify safe, effective, and targeted rehabilitation exercises for sports medicine protocols.
    * Apply rehabilitation techniques for various injuries and different muscle, joint, and bone sports medicine injuries and dysfunctions

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The AFPA Weight Management Consultant Certification course provides a holistic approach to weight and health management. The Weight Management Consultant program will educate you on how to guide your clients to achieve their short-term weight loss goals, but more importantly, provide you with the skills necessary to help them achieve long-term weight management.

You will gain the education and training that will enable you to combine sound nutrition, safe and effective physical activity, appropriate lifestyle changes and psychological and emotional support into programs that will help you to help them to achieve their goals. All of these components are important and all must be looked at carefully when designing a realistic and reasonable weight management programs. Diet, exercise and lifestyle together are the basis of a complete and well-rounded program. Few people lose weight by just dieting or just exercising alone.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The AFPA Yoga Fitness Instructor Certification (Level I) course is designed to instruct beginner and intermediate students. The program emphasizes safe, effective, and inspiring teaching methods that prepare you to be a confident and competent Certified Yoga Fitness Instructor. You will learn excellent teaching skills, how to plan a class, how to create confidence in your students and how and when to provide posture corrections. This program offers instruction on how to live the yogic lifestyle enhancing personal health and centeredness through yoga. The Yoga Fitness Instructor Certification course is designed to educate participants about various yoga techniques and how to incorporate them into an individual and group setting. This course will enable you to formulate your own personal teaching style.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Yoga Fitness Instructor Certification (Level II) course builds upon the information presented in the Yoga Fitness Instructor Certification (Level I) course. It is strongly recommended that an individual take the Level I course prior to Level II or at least be an experienced yoga practioner.

The AFPA Yoga Fitness Instructor Certification (Level II) course offers health and fitness teacher's advice on structuring their yoga classes and shows instructors how to get more from their routines. Emphasis is placed on the importance of standing asanas, joint mobility, and muscular strength. Additionally, presented is a regimen of joint-freeing exercises and describes body reading, a technique that allows practitioners to detect muscular imbalances. You will also learn how to assess individual body imbalances and adapt classes around these imbalances and individual's strengths, flexibility, range of motion.

Building on the AFPA Yoga Fitness Instructor Certification (Level I), this course introduces the student to a further range of postures and opens up a whole new world of well-being. This course takes the student further along the journey of inner peace and harmony. Whether you are already teaching yoga classes or are preparing to do so, you will find these courses to be educational, practical, and inspirational.

Course graduates will gain a clear sense of how to lead a successful class; how to address the needs of a diverse population, and an understanding of your own strengths as a teacher.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

data.name: American Barre Techniqueâ¢ (ABT)
data.about:
The American Barre Techniqueâ¢ barre instructor certification is the most popular online training agency. As a CEC Provider for ACE, ISSA, & NASM, they are a leader in the field. 

American Barre Techniqueâ¢ provides a standard of teaching that stands above the rest. The technique was developed from the fundamental movements of classical ballet barre class fused with traditional fitness exercises. Body alignment and postural positions stem from classical ballet technique and combine the core exercises and movements utilized in strength training. The effortless collaboration of classical ballet technique and strength training create American Barre Techniqueâ¢, which assists in toning the body, stabilizing balance, increasing overall flexibility, improving endurance, and boosting self-confidence.  

 
Mission:
To educate learners to train to be the best instructor they can be. To develop knowledgeable instructors to inspire and encourage each client to find a deeper level of inner strength.  
  
Vision:
To be the utmost trusted teaching source of barre fitness. To be a motivating program to encourage instructors while simultaneously reaching our financial and strategic goals.

data.name: National Posture Institute (NPI)
data.about:
The National Posture Institute (NPI) is an educational and certificate organization that provides health and fitness educational programs, public outreach, corporate wellness, and professional certificate programs for allied health/medical/fitness professionals to become Certified Posture Specialistsâ¢ (CPSâ¢) , Certified Resistance Training Professionalsâ¢ (RTPâ¢), and Certified Goniometry Specialistsâ¢ (CGSâ¢). 

The National Posture Institute addresses the following five distinct areas to achieve its mission:

1.  Certificate Programs and CEC/CEU Workshops - Educating personal trainers, fitness professionals, athletic trainers, and allied health/medical professionals to become Certified Posture Specialistsâ¢ (CPSâ¢),  Certified Resistance Training Professionalsâ¢ (RTPâ¢), and Certified Goniometry Specialistsâ¢ (CGSâ¢).  NPI has created online courses/certificate programs and onsite workshops that provide CECs/CEUs for personal trainers, athletic trainers, RDs, physical therapists, and others.  To learn more about becoming a Certified NPI Professionalâ¢ go here:   National Posture Institute Certificate Programs

2.  NPI Affiliate Program- Providing Health Clubs/Allied Health-Medical Facilities successful business solutions through the integration of NPI's certificate and Posture Assessment Program to retain and build a large client/patient/membership base as an NPI Affiliate.

3.  Colleges/Universities- Offering NPI's certificate and CEC workshops to students at colleges or universities with two/four-year degrees and graduate programs in exercise science, personal fitness training, physical therapy, athletic training, and/or other related allied health/medical program.  Attend an NPI Posture CEC Workshop at a College-University Campus:   NPI College-University Posture CEC Workshop

4.  Public Education- Educating and training individual consumers, the public, employers, companies, school systems, organizations, and the community, on proper posture, body alignment, and exercise movements through our Public Posture Education Programsâ¢.

5.  Research- Funding research awards focusing on posture and body alignment in relation to assessments, exercise movements, injury prevention, balance, sports performance, physiology, special populations, and ergonomics.

Registration/Contact Information:
If you are interested in registering or learning more about the National Posture Institute's (NPI) - Certificate Programs, Onsite CEC Workshops, Products, or Services - please contact us at: Email info@npionline.org, Phone-888-240-2914, or visit our Website  www.npionline.org or "Like Us" on Facebook-   National Posture Institute Facebook  MEDIA and NEWS OUTLETS may contact us at media@npionline.org 

National Posture Institute Products and Services:
The National Posture Institute has the following products: DVDs, Posture Grids, Posture Assessment Software, Functional Capacity Software, Balance Testing Systems, Goniometers, Handles/Bars, and Exercise/Rehab Program Clipart Software. In addition, NPI also provides the following programs/services: Certified Posture Specialist Program, Onsite CEC Workshops, Corporate Wellness Program, Online Posture Analysis and Correction Program, Educational Webinars, and NPI Affiliate Program.  Visit NPI's Product Website  National Posture Institute Products 

Join the Movement-Career Advancement as a Certified NPI Professionalâ¢:
Join the growing number of personal trainers (from the American Council of Exercise (ACE), American College of Sports Medicine (ACSM), Aerobics and Fitness Association of America (AFAA), National Strength and Conditioning Association (NSCA), National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM), International Sports Sciences Association (ISSA) /group exercise instructors (TRX, Pilates, Yoga, Zumba, etc...), physical therapists (American Physical Therapy Association (APTA), athletic trainers (National Athletic Training Association (NATA), chiropractors, and others that have a successful and rewarding career as a Certified Posture Specialistâ¢ or Certified Resistance Training Professionalâ¢.  To learn more about becoming a Certified NPI Professionalâ¢ go here:   National Posture Institute Certificate Programs

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The Online Certified Posture Specialist (CPS) program prepares personal trainers, group exercise instructors, ahtletic trainers, and health/medical (physical therapists/chiropractors) professionals to assess and educate their clients/patients in all areas of posture and body alignment.  The Certified Posture Specialist (CPS) Program will describe, demonstrate, and teach posture analysis and correction in an easy to follow sequential order.  The program teaches individuals how to implement NPI's Posture Assessment Program into their organizations current health and exercise assessment program and teaches methods to correct alignment, reverse patterns, improve posture, relieve back pain and train clients/patients through exercise/rehab movements.

Registration/Contact Information:
If you are interested in registering or learning more about the National Posture Institute's (NPI) - Certified Posture Specialist Program - please contact us at: via email info@npionline.org, phone-888-240-2914, or visit our website www.npionline.org 

The Online Certified Posture Specialist program has been approved by the following organizations/associations for continuing education credits/units:
â¢Personal Trainers:  Can Fit Pro (3.0 PTS), NPI (23 CECs) 
â¢Kinesiotherapists:  AKTA (2.3 CEUs) 
â¢Registered Dietitians/Dietetic Technicians, Registered: ADA/CDR (23.0 CPEUs) 

â¢Physical Therapists:â¢Florida Physical Therapy Association (12.0 CECs) â¢Physical Therapy Association of Georgia (2.3 CEUs) 
â¢State of Illinois-IDFPR (23 CEs) â¢Maryland Board of Physical Therapy (2.3 CEUs) â¢Texas Physical Therapy Association (23 CCUs)

certifications.title: Certificate in Advanced Personal Fitness Training (Approved by American College of Sports Medicine)

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The Online Professional Advanced Certificate in Personal Fitness Training  (Approved by American College of Sports Medicine) is a web-based, instructor led educational experience that includes input and guidance from outstanding faculty/instructors drawn from colleges/universities, the allied health/medical field, and the personal fitness training profession.  The Personal Fitness Training certificate program has five required courses and an OPTIONAL INTERNSHIP COURSE:  Kinesiology, Exercise Physiology, Health Risk Profiles, Business Management, and Designing Exercise Prescriptions.  Students can elect to take the Advanced Professional Certificate in Personal Fitness Training, which requires an additional 3 courses (Biomechanics of Resistance Training, Functional Flexibility, and Nutrition Managment). 

The certificate program is designed to supply essential education integrating exercise science curriculum and practical training techniques into a systematic model that teaches students to progress their clients through different training levels and phases. Students will be prepared for careers working at medically-based fitness facilities, community wellness programs, personal training studios, physical therapy clinics, corporate fitness centers, YMCAâs/JCCâs, and private and commercial health clubs.  Included with the either certificate program registration, you will receive complimentary access to receive the National Posture Instituteâs Certified Resistance Training Professionalâ¢ (RTPâ¢) designation.   The following National Organizations/Associations have approved each Personal Fitness Training/Advanced Fitness Training course for Continuing Education Credits/Units (CECs/CEUs):
â¢Commission on Dietetic Registration (CDR), the credentialing agency for the Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics (AND, formally ADA) has approved the Certificate in Personal Fitness Training and Advanced Personal Fitness Training program for 30 Continuing Professional Education Units (CPEUs) per course for both the Registered Dietitian (RDs) and Dietetic Technician-Registered (DTRs).
â¢American College of Sports Medicine (ACSM) / 20 CECs

certifications.title: Certificate in Fitness Business Management (Approved by American College of Sports Medicine)

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The Online Professional Certificate in Fitness Business Management  (Approved by American College of Sports Medicine) is an instructor led, web-based program developed to establish an industry standard in fitness management education for allied health and fitness professionals, personal trainers, fitness managers, and entrepreneurs that wish to establish a successful business model and fitness operation.  The certificate program has four required courses and an OPTIONAL INTERNSHIP COURSE:  Entrepreneurship in Fitness, Financial Principles and Business Concepts, Sales, and Fitness Management. 

The certificate prepares students to implement successful business systems in the following settings:  private and commercial health clubs, medically-based fitness facilities, community wellness centers, personal training studios, physical therapy clinics, YMCAâs, JCCâs, college/university centers, recreational settings, and corporate fitness centers.  A unique aspect of the program is the optional field internship experience which enables students to practice fitness management concepts in a real life health and fitness setting.



The following National Organizations/Associations have approved each Fitness Business Management course for Continuing Education Credits/Units (CECs/CEUs):

certifications.title: The BioMechanics Method - Level One Corrective Exercise Specialist

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The BioMechanics Method Corrective Exercise Specialist (TBMM-CES) course is the official educational program for personal trainers and fitness professionals who want to be recognized as industry specialists in the field of Corrective Exercise. It is perfect for those who want to expand their current service offerings to include pain relief and injury prevention through corrective exercise. 

The BioMechanics Method-CES course contains five learning modules that take students step-by-step through the fundamentals of structural assessment, understanding muscles and movement, the fundamentals of corrective exercise, corrective exericse program design, and includes a complete exercise library in video and written format.  Those who successfully complete the course receive a certificate of completion verifying their status as a Specialist in The BioMechanics Method.  The TBMM-CES course is available online, as a correspondence course, or as a combination of online/DVD/textbook/CD-ROM.  

CEC-approved by ACE, PTA Global, ACSM, NESTA, NFPT, YMCA, Fitness Australia, CSEP, and WITS.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: multiple choice exams (and retakes if needed) included at no extra charge

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: None - suitable for all learning and experience levels

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Exercise Physiology, Life & Wellness Coaching, Personal Trainer, Special Populations, Corrective Exercise, Athletic Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This training looks even deeper at hatha yoga practices with a focus on Base of Support, Center of Gravity, Skeletal Anatomy and the Physiology of Stretching. We explore Anatomy and Kinesiology concepts that apply to common misalignments in certain poses. We address nerve plexus and glands associated with each Chakra while looking at the hormones secreted during our practice. Finally, we look at mind/body intention that create muscle activation and relaxation when holding a pose.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Hot yoga programs and classes are gaining popularity for good reason. Heat is purifying, cleansing and even healing. This one day workshop emphasizes deep stretches and detoxification. We learn how to safely execute this practice for the general population. Instructors are taught various medical conditions that can occur in the heat, as well as the benefits of a heated practice. The sequences taught are based on YogaFit's concept of "Flex and Flow".

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: YogaLean is a one day workshop that discusses losing weight as a transformational process involving the mind/body and spirit. This is a weight management program designed to work from the inside out. It draws heavily from the yogic practices of breathing, meditation and mindfulness as well as YogaFit class sequences. The inspirational messages we teach for each pose will enlighten and empower all  participants who are on this journey.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
This course is approved by Yoga Alliance.  It includes the following:
Level 1, Level 1 Integration, Level 2, Level 3, Level 4, Level 5, YogaFit Seniors, and additionally one other specialty training of YogaFit Pre/Postnatal, or YogaFit kids. Then add Two of our other one day trainings such as YogaBack, YogaSweat, YogaLean, YogaCore, YogaStrength, etc. Please check our website for extensive details on locations and dates of each training.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Please visit our website for extensive details on the latest updated information on our 500 Hour program. www.yogafit.com

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This interactive two day training offers the musculoskeletal anatomy and biomechanics necessary to teach a hatha yoga class safely and effectively. We explore the Seven Principles of Alignment (SPA) and apply them to postures while adding comprehensive details of anatomical concepts.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: We are frequently adding new one week intensives to our schedule. This training includes one week of yoga classes, meditation, hiking, philosophy, group sharing, etc. in a beautiful setting.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: YogaFit Kids one day day training encourages kids, teens, parents and teachers to explore their natural abilities. We honor the diversity of each student's flexibility, strength, balance and endurance. It is a fun, playful class where kids move energy through their bodies and bring calm to their minds. It is beneficial to all children to feel successful in their physical health, so we teach games and do many activities to build on that concept. These activities include breathing techniques, share circles, laughter yoga, partner yoga, and cooperative learning. This will develop character, creativity, positive social interaction, emotional balance/intelligence/awareness, and kinesthetic awareness.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This informative two day workshop gives instructors the tools to create inspiring vinyasa yoga classes that are founded on flow yet grounded in the safety of exercise science. This includes physical execution 0f 40 poses, transitions, and modifications with an emphasis on effectiveness for our students. Breathing techniques are also included.  Participants will receive a Certificate of Completion which qualifies one to teach a YogaFit style class once the Community Service is complete. YogaFit requires the Level 1 Trainee to donate 8 hours of Practice Teaching in a community service setting, bringing the gift of yoga to individuals who would not normally be exposed to yoga on a regular basis. This training is open to all.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: No prerequisite, only the desire to learn.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: After building a firm foundation in Level 1, this training concentrates on communicating the essence of YogaFit to ourselves and our classes/community. Trainees will develop their transformational language skills through the use of positive affirmations and discover how to address different learning styles. We examine over 20 poses with 6 new breathing techniques.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Level 3 takes trainees on an introspective journey of self-awareness. We spend time discussing meta physical and philosophical aspects of yoga while addressing the mind-body connection effects. We study the Four Paths of Yoga, Chakras, journaling, meditation, health benefits, brain and nervous system, just to name a few.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Level 4 concentrates on advanced yogic training and lifestyle. The teachings include, pose breakdown of 30 advanced poses and sequencing, breathing techniques, sound therapy, chanting, mantras, Sanskrit translations and terms, Yoga Philosophy of Yoga Sutras, Bhagavad Gita, Advanced master classes, Mudras, Koshas, just to name a few.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Level 5 works with creative visualization, Body Mapping, The Power of Yoga Now, and the Business of Yoga. We learn new poses with breathing techniques and trainees have the opportunity to take themselves to the next level.  They experiment with flow practices, manifestation meditations, practical business tips and body/mind integration.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: PilatesFit is a one day workshop designed to enhance the muscular/skeletal integration using breathing techniques to strengthen the participants core.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Designed exclusively for YogaFit by a board certified obstetrician/gynecologist who has been practicing yoga, the program features safety for all participants. Classic yoga poses and breathing techniques selected for use during pregnancy are linked for a "slow flow".  This gentle sequencing of poses will give trainees ideas for participants who attend classes. Modifications and props are clearly outlined for safety and relief of aches and pains of pregnancy.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: PASSIVE supported poses are designed to deliberately induce a deep state of relaxation, a seed for meditation. ACTIVE supported poses are designed to deliberately awaken dull areas of the body to improve circulation and encourage healing. This four day training covers: 25 restorative poses and their healing benefits, Thematic class mapping, breathing techniques, specific  prescriptions to address particular challenges.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This one day training allows instructors to modify/enhance and give options for YogaFit poses. We design classes with variations to increase the fitness levels of individuals 55+ years in age, now the largest age group in our history! Learn to create workouts for Seniors who are seeking programs to continue challenging them, yet honoring their bodies.  The methods will allow Seniors to increase muscular strength, endurance, flexibility, bone density, stamina, lung capacity and overall wellness.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This four day workshop is an introduction into Yoga Therapy. Material covered includes postural analysis screenings, physical assessments, therapy program design, myofascial concepts, foam roller techniques, and breathing techniques.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Teaches the yoga poses synonymous with functional core stabilization and strength. We focus on training the major muscle groups involved in passive and active applications of our lumbo-pelvic region, trunk and shoulder girdle. We explore our ability to control the position and motion of our trunk relative to our pelvis and limbs during the yoga poses.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Learn to balance the body and improve cycle time with this exciting 4-hour yoga teacher training workshop. Discover new ways to awaken and innervate the muscles used during a cycle class. We develop new tools to stretch the lower body while strengthening the core center.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This program was developed to incorporate one-on-one yoga for personal trainers to use with their clients. We use exercise science to for safety and effectiveness in practicing the alignment of 38 basic poses. We examine postural assessments for the client's range of motion and muscle balance and many more concepts of fitness.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: YogaPlus teacher training includes yoga postures and modifications for all populations. Many people will benefit from this type of practice if they are looking for a comfortable transition into wellness. We demonstrate a diverse use of props so EVERY BODY can learn to enjoy movement and promote increased activity levels in their lives. We experience the breath, body and mind connection that brings about opening, healing and a calm state.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: A hybrid 4-hour workshop that focuses on developing functional  strength and endurance using added resistance. It is a challenging workout that fuses yoga poses with weights to enjoy an overall feeling of mind/body and strength. The class also features dynamic flexibility options, like PNF, for increasing overall wellness.

The FiTOURÂ® Advanced Yoga Instructor Certification Program will provide you with an understanding of how to design a Power Yoga class that flows from one pose to the next in a seamless manner.  In addition you will learn valuable information on how to use breath control during a Power Yoga class to calm and relax the mind while empowering the body.

Improve Performance! Part I of this course is full of information on program design, exercises and training techniques for general fitness and fitness athlete clients/students.  You will learn how to create comprehensive and balanced core & functional training programs.  Learn challenging exercises using medicine balls, balance equipment and sports-conditioning drills to progressively improve core strength & functionality which, in turn, will result in improved performance.

Improve Quality of Life!  Part II provides an in-depth look at the obstacles faced by Active Older Adults and how to improve their functionality through fitness programming to lead to higher quality of life.  If you train Active Older Adults, this course is a MUST!  You will learn strategies to create programs that will implement full body strength and function with activities that are fun yet challenging.

At the conclusion of the course, you will understand how to safely and effectively implement and develop core & functional programming for one-on-one training, group training, circuit training, flexibility, and on-the-road fitness programs.

attrs.value:
The FiTOURÂ® Primary Nutrition Certification provides a unique, self-paced plan that shows you how to teach your clients to improve your eating habits in ways that fit their lifestyle.

This practical, research-based strategy addresses the root causes of unhealthy eating, and gives you the tools to succeed in eating better. The FiTOURÂ® Primary Nutrition Certification course will focus on strategies that show how to choose the right balance of the right foods for optimal health, set realistic goals and rewards, and cope with triggers for unhealthy eating. Youâll also learn other helpful tips:

Keep healthy eating in mind while shopping for food
Eat well when dining out or away from home
Make sense of nutrition information and diet product claims
The course textbook, Nancy Clark's Sports Nutrition Guidebook, contains checklists, charts, and other features that will help you personalize the program and keep it fun all the way through. Fad diets offer only short-term results that often do more harm than good. Healthy Eating Every Day is a sensible, step-by-step lifetime plan that works!

Get as serious about your diet as you are about your sport. The FiTOURÂ® Primary Nutrition Certification prescribes just the right combination of foods, fluids, and supplements to get your clients across the finish line in record time.

At the same time, the text shows leaders how to promote a sense of fun and social connectedness in an exercise program.

The course textbook was written by the coauthor of the nationally known Heart Smart Program, Fitness Education for Children emphasizes the need to make developing healthy lifestyles a team effort. Loaded with ready-to-use information, the course textbook is a practical, time-saving resource. You'll also find many other special features such as reproducible instructional materials, sample letters and contracts, authentic assessment instruments, a fitness education portfolio, task card samples, motivational strategies, and guidelines for including children with disabilities.

data.name: (ISFTA) International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA)
data.about:
International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA) was founded in 2000 by a team of medical and fitness professionals with the intention of providing training at a level superior to that which had previously been available. We are members of the Institute for Credentialing Excellence (ICE), the International Health, Racquet & Sports Club Association (IHRSA), Board of Certification for Athletic Trainers (BOC) approved provider, National Certification Board for Therapeutic Massage and Bodywork (NCTMB) approved provider, a provisional affiliate of the National Board of Fitness Examiners (NBFE), and approved by many individual state boards as a continuing education provider for allied health, wellness and medical professionals. We have been providing quality education for over a decade and have some of the highest standards in the industry.

International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA) is one of the fastest growing providers of Fitness Certifications, Specialty Certifications & Medical Continuing Education. We offer personal instruction through LIVE courses, workshops, seminars and self paced home study with instructors who guide you through every step of the certification & educational process.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Personal Trainer Certification qualifies you to enter the fitness industry with the confidence to provide basic fitness training services to the general population.  Upon successful completion, you can begin a career as a Certified Personal Trainer, either working for a health club or gym, or starting your own business.  The ISFTA Personal Trainer Certification is a GREAT first step to a career in the fitness industry. Most individuals who take this course have a sincere passion for fitness and a desire to help others to choose a healthy lifestyle as well. We are known to have some of the highest standards in the industry, and when you earn your certification, you will be recognized nationwide as a fitness professional.

The investment for this class is $399, which includes your course materials, live workshop and exam fee. If you prefer, you can choose the split payment option and register for just $199.  The final payment must be made PRIOR to taking your exam.  Space is limited and the sooner you register, the more study time you will have prior to the class.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The ISFTA Rehab Fitness Specialist course is designed to teach Physical Therapists, Occupational Therapists, Massage Therapists, Chiropractors and others in the medical field how to transition a patient from a rehab setting to a post-rehab fitness program.  During this live workshop, therapists will learn how to integrate various concepts of fitness and the physiological impact of dynamic movement to their treatment programs. Anatomy, physiology and kinesiology are examined in depth to provide a greater understanding of the body.  It also prepares the therapist to provide a more comprehensive home exercise program that is more appropriate to higher level patients.

attrs.label: Exam Delivery Method
attrs.value:
In Person
      Note: With Optional ISFTA CPT Voucher

Category

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
During the ISFTA Stability Ball Trainer Certification one day workshop, you will learn the wide array of benefits that stability ball training can offer to your clients/patients including core strength, posture, balance, body awareness, flexibility and even cardiovascular fitness. The ISFTA Stability Ball Trainer Certification  is the most comprehensive workshop available to-date. Topics include everything from ball sizing, inflating and neutral alignment on the ball to training for dozens of exercises that you can then take and apply to your clients/patients fitness or rehab programing.

This class is open to both fitness, health/wellness and medical professionals.

Please Note: Medical Professional do not have to complete and or PASS the exam in order to obtain CE credits for license renewal.

data.name: American Academy of Health and Fitness (AAHF)
data.about: The American Academy of Health and Fitness (AAHF) is a provider of specialty certifications and continuing education home study programs. These research-based fitness education programs, available in a convenient distance-learning format, offer continuing education and professional development for health and fitness professionals (personal trainers, group fitness instructors, health/wellness coaches, sports nutrition specialists, athletic trainers and certified nurse aides) who wish to specialize in youth health and fitness, senior health and fitness, functional fitness, or health and fitness for cancer survivors.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Our SrFitâ¢ Senior Fitness Specialty Certification Home Study Program is offered to you in a distance-learning format providing research-based continuing education for health and fitness professionals (personal trainers, group fitness instructors, health/wellness coaches, and athletic trainers) who wish to specialize in training adults in their mid 40âs and older This home study program presents information that will enable senior fitness trainers to gain an understanding of how the aging process affects all the systems of the body, identify dietary changes that may be needed, and develop effective training strategies for fitness levels spanning master athlete to frail and elderly. You will learn to prevent, improve and manage a multitude of chronic diseases, improve flexibility, endurance, strength and optimal function for Baby Boomers and beyond.

Our SrFitâ¢ is the only senior fitness certification approved by all major personal training, sports nutrition, group fitness certification organizations and BOC for athletic training (19-24 continuing education hours). Certified personal trainers, group fitness instructors, health and wellness coaches, sports nutrition specialists and athletic trainers holding more than one certification may obtain CECs/CEUS for all certifications for which they need continuing education with this single home study program at no additional cost.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Our JrFitâ¢ Youth Fitness Specialty Certification* Home Study Program is offered to you in a distance-learning format providing research-based continuing education for health and fitness professionals (personal trainers, group fitness instructors, health/wellness coaches, sports nutrition specialists and athletic trainers) who wish to specialize in youth fitness. This home study program offers a highly effective plan for enabling youth fitness trainers to improve health, increase fitness, and reduce body fat for kids and youth (age 7-17). Trainers will gain an understanding of sensible strength and power training, athletic conditioning and nutrition to safely and effectively train youth of all fitness levels spanning the star youth athlete to the kid suffering with childhood obesity and low self esteem.

Our JrFitâ¢ is the only youth fitness certification* approved by all major personal training, sports nutrition, group fitness certification organizations and BOC for athletic training (19-24 continuing education hours). Certified personal trainers, group fitness instructors, health and wellness coaches, sports nutrition specialists and athletic trainers holding more than one certification may obtain CECs/CEUS for all certifications for which they need continuing education with this single home study program at no additional cost.

attrs.label: Category
attrs.value: Personal Trainer, Special Populations, Sports Conditioning

certifications.title: Fitness Assessment and Exercise Prescription for All Ages

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Our Fitness Assessment and Exercise Prescription for All Ages Specialist Home Study Program is approved by all major personal training, sports nutrition, group fitness certification organizations, and BOC for athletic training (19-24 continuing education hours).  It is a continuing education home study program for health and fitness professionals to safely and accurately assess cardiorespiratory fitness, muscular fitness, body composition, flexibility, and balance; then design safe and effective programs for resistance training, weight management, body composition, flexibility, low back care, and balance for all ages This home study program materials are available for immediate download after purchase. All materials for this program are available electronically. Nothing is mailed.

certifications.title: Cancer and the Older Adult Specialist Home Study Program

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Our Cancer and the Older Adultâ¢ Specialist Home Study Program is approved by all major personal training, sports nutrition, group fitness certification organizations, and BOC for athletic training (2 - 7 continuing education hours). It offered to you in a distance-learning format providing advanced continuing education for health and fitness professionals (personal trainers, group fitness instructors, health/wellness coaches, sports nutrition specialists and athletic trainers) who wish to specialize in training cancer survivors. This home study program is available for immediate download after purchase. Trainers will learn research-based guidelines for both avoiding and addressing cancer. This resource identifies cancer risk factors and provides cancer prevention strategies related to lifestyle. It is an ideal continuing education program for any fitness professional who wishes to work safely and effectively with mature adults who have experienced cancer.

data.name: LES MILLS (Les Mills)
data.about:
Here at Les Mills we have a really big mission - to make the planet a fitter and healthier place. This week, across 80 countries, in over 13,000 fitness facilities, millions of people will put aside whatever else is happening in their lives and lose themselves for an hour in the pure exhilaration of a LES MILLSâ¢ group fitness class.
 
Each of our 75,000 certified instructors worldwide will give their all to inspire everyone of those class members, taking them to places they could never go alone.

We believe fitness can be more fun and more effective, and we prove it every day. Millions of people are exercising with us, and the numbers are growing every day! To reach even further, we need new talent and fresh blood. We're looking for people who want to turn it up...

Are you one of them? Become a LES MILLSâ¢ instructor!

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
LES MILLS SPRINTÂ® is built on the science of high-intensity interval training (HIIT). Itâs a quick and hard style of training that returns rapid results with minimal joint impact.

The short duration of a LES MILLS SPRINT workout will motivate you to push your physical and mental limits. It features bursts of intensity where you work as hard as possible, followed by periods of rest that prepare you for the next effort. The payoff is you burn calories for hours after a good HIIT workout.

For more information and signup for instructor certifications, go to www.lesmills.com.

attrs.label: Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Indoor Cycling, Sports Conditioning

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The original barbell workout, BODYPUMPÂ® is for anyone looking to get lean, toned and fit â fast.

Using light to moderate weights with lots of repetition, BODYPUMP gives you a total body workout. Instructors coach  through the scientifically proven moves and techniques pumping out encouragement, motivation and great music â helping you achieve much more than on your own! Your class will leave feeling challenged and motivated.

For more information and signup for instructor certifications, go to www.lesmills.com.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
BODYFLOWÂ® is the yoga-based class that improves your mind, your body and your life.

During BODYFLOW an inspired soundtrack plays as you bend and stretch through a series of simple yoga moves and embrace elements of Tai Chi and Pilates. Breathing control is a part of all the exercises, and instructors will always provide options for those just getting started. 

Strengthen your entire body and leave the class feeling calm
and centered.

For more information and signup for instructor certifications, go to www.lesmills.com.

attrs.label: Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Mind Body, Pilates, Yoga

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Exercising muscles around the core, CXWORXÂ® provides the vital ingredient for a stronger body. A stronger core makes you better at all things you do, from everyday life to your favorite sports - itâs the glue that holds everything together.

All the moves in CXWORX have options, so itâs challenging but achievable. During the 30-minute workout trained instructors guide you through correct technique as you work with resistance tubes and weight plates, as well as body weight exercises like crunches, and hovers as well as some hip, butt and lower back exercises.

For more information and signup for instructor certifications, go to www.lesmills.com.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
BODYSTEPâ¢ is a full-body cardio workout to tone your butt and thighs.

If you fancy quicker stepping and the chance to showcase your rhythm and flair then BODYSTEP Classic is the way to go. There are always lots of options to get you through

data.name: R.I.P.P.E.D. - The One Stop Body Shock
data.about:
R.I.P.P.E.D. â The One Stop Body Shockâ¢ is a "Plateau Proof Fitness Formula" that helps you to create continuity, consistency and challenge in each and every R.I.P.P.E.D. class. It is Plateau Proof, because each component of the workout provides a uniquely different emphasis or system response, so your body never gets accustomed to the constantly changing format. Thus, regular R.I.P.P.E.D. participants achieve undeniable, ultimate results in minimal time, boasting 750-1000 calories burned in just 50 minutes.

This total body, high intensity style program, utilizing free weights, resistance and body weight, masterfully combines the components of R.I.P.P.E.D.--- Resistance, Intervals, Power, Plyometrics and Endurance as the workout portion along with Diet suggestions to help you attain and maintain your physique in ways that are fun, safe, doable and extremely effective. The deliberate combination of the R.I.P.P.E.D. elements and how they are precisely organized in the R.I.P.P.E.D. class format provide the basis for the One Stop Body Shock System, by stimulating both, different energy systems and muscles in each workout segment, changing the focus and activities every 6 to 9 minutes. Along with driving, motivating music, participants jam through R.I.P.P.E.D. with smiles, determination and strength. No boredom here, for all levels, R.I.P.P.E.D. is effective, itâs tough yet doable; R.I.P.P.E.D. will absolutely challenge your levels of fitness and endurance!

data.name: Balanced BodyÂ®
data.about:
Balanced Body Education
Develop your mind, your body and your career.

Balanced BodyÂ® provides Pilates education for every stage of your career. From high quality instructor training to our renowned Pilates on TourÂ® conferences, we are committed to supporting your personal and professional growth. Whether you want to become a gifted Mat instructor, an inspiring Reformer teacher or a comprehensively trained Pilates professional, Balanced Body connects you to the widest array of educational offerings in the world.

Balanced Bodyâs Educator Network
Balanced Bodyâs mission of expanding the world of Pilates includes supporting and promoting independent educators as well as Balanced Body's educational programs.

The Education FinderÂ® is your window to Pilates education. You can find instructor training, continuing education and conferences from all over the world.

Balanced Body Pilates Instructor Training
For over thirty years, Balanced BodyÂ® has been the leader in innovating and expanding the Pilates market by providing the highest quality Pilates equipment to over 100 countries. We continue this tradition with innovative Pilates Education through our worldwide network of master instructors.

Our faculty are experienced, caring and passionate Pilates instructors from a wide variety of backgrounds. Their rich diversity of experience and perspectives allow us to offer courses appropriate for studio, fitness and post-rehabilitation environments.

Our curriculum includes the traditional Pilates Mat, Reformer, Trapeze Table, Chair and Barrels repertoire as well as modifications and additional exercises designed to make teaching Pilate safe, effective and fun. Our curriculum is straightforward and consistent with the current Pilates Method Alliance (PMA) guidelines.

Our program offers three levels of Pilates Instructor Education: Mat, Reformer and Comprehensive. Each level is offered in affordable modules so you can take your first course now and continue your training next week, next month or next year, whichever works best for you. Each module is designed to allow you to start teaching quickly and to continue learning as you progress.

data.name: Total Gym
data.about: Total GymÂ® is the worldâs leading privately-held manufacturer of functional and bodyweight training equipment. Founded in 1974, the San Diego-based companyâs Total Gym products are used in 14,000 physical therapy clinics, athletic training facilities, hospitals, universities, professional sports teams and health clubs, inspiring over 24 million workouts per year worldwide. Total Gym has a 15-year relationship with American Telecast Products, LLC, which launched the Total Gym bodyweight trainer into the consumer market with the longest running television infomercial in history, selling over four million units. Now with distribution in 23 countries, Total Gym continues to lead the industry with the latest functional training equipment and the award-winning GRAVITYSystemÂ® commercial fitness program.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
GRAVITY Foundation is the introductory training course for all fitness professionals seeking to gain practical experience and knowledge of the Total GymÂ® GRAVITYSystemÂ®.

The comprehensive two day course covers movement execution and its connection with incline bodyweight training, including the concept of SMA adaptability, and muscle isolation to integration. Youâll apply this to the Total GymÂ® Exercise Library, which includes more than 120 exercises performed on the Total Gym incline trainer. Attendees engage in the process of creating progressive and regressive GRAVITY exercise programs for Total Gym that are scalable to client ability and based on program efficiency.

Effective program development and revenue models for one-to-one and multi-client personal training sessions are reviewed to assist in business development for a facility and an individual trainer. Attendees will also learn how to implement predesigned workouts for strength and endurance when working with small or large groups. Presenter mastery skills are also covered in the course, along with review of the Total Gym GRAVITY launch plan including marketing protocols to create a winning GRAVITY program.

Prerequisites to be a GRAVITYTrainerÂ®:
You must be 18 years of age or older.
Attendees must hold a current certification from a professional certifying organization.

Course Objectives:
-Demonstrate mastery of the Total Gym incline bodyweight trainer and accessories.
-Review basic anatomy, physiology, biomechanics and functional movement.
-Apply resistance training fundamentals to the Total Gym.
-Learn and apply the Total Gym Exercise Library.
-Design individualized multi-client and group GRAVITY programming.
-Demonstrate how to create a workout for a wide variety of client goals and abilities.
-Learn how to create a profitable GRAVITY business model for group and personal training.

Earn CECs: 1.6 ACE, 14.25 AFAA, NASM 1.6, BCRPA 16.0, canfitpro 4 FIS & 4 PTS.

 How we do that.....

QiDANCE is a cardio dance workout that combines movements and music from all over the world, exploring a universe of cultures and traditions. Each song is written by multi- Grammy award winning composer and producer, Kike Santander. 
To enhance the instructor's learning experience, the QiDANCE Foundation Course is a comprehensive training, which is accompanied by self-assessment tools that are delivered throughout the course. data.name: BASI Pilates (BASI)
data.about:
BASIÂ® Teacher Training Program is for the Pilates professional, by the Pilates professional. It is an educational vehicle, which upholds the standards of the work of Joseph Pilates and teaches the essence of his philosophy. All members of this organization, be it students, graduates, educators or administrators adhere to the ideological belief of providing guidance and nurturing to all that seek to study this method. Well being is the ultimate goal, and in pursuit of this goal every level of the human condition will be addressed to better each individual as well as the world we live in. No person shall be denied this privilege. BASIÂ® endeavors to grow in substance, not only in size, and will always strive to be true to science, to knowledge, to artistry and to the intentions of Joseph Pilates in providing the finest education possible. 

Basi PilatesÂ® has always remained true to art, to science and most importantly to Joseph and Clara Pilates. Since its inception in 1989, BASI PilatesÂ® has been an educational vehicle devoted to creating a professional standard worthy of this method. We are committed to preparing teachers of the highest caliber who are able to perpetuate and preserve the gift of Pilates. BASI PilatesÂ® embodies integrity, high principles and belief of the power of oneself - words and notions that we take very seriously. If you are willing to travel the often rigorous, demanding and ultimately rewarding path - in other words, to go the distance - BASI PilatesÂ® will provide the knowledge.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
BASI Fit is comprised of two, two-day courses. The first is Fit Mat which focuses on group Mat classes and the second is Fit Reformer which focuses on group Reformer classes.

Successful conclusion of these courses will qualify a fitness professional to teach Pilates Mat and Reformer classes.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be qualified to teach group fitness classes.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The BASI Comprehensive Teachers Training course is the most rigorous in the business, and a student needs to pass all of it in order to be accredited as a teacher by BASI. There are no half-measures. As the term comprehensive implies, this course is NOT splintered into individual apparatus and many levels, as some programs are; it is about the whole. BASI believes that a teacher needs to be familiar with it all. 

This also avoids confusion for members of the public, who often have to decide between teachers; one, say, who has graduated from level one Reformer and another who has completed a comprehensive Pilates course. They both present themselves as Pilates teachers and both have certificates of completion. But, in the eyes of BASI, there is no comparison. 

A CTTC graduate has both the knowledge and the accreditation to teach students of all levels on all apparatus. We do not give partial accreditation for a partial education.  It may sound severe, but it maintains the extremely high standard of our education and it avoids misinterpretation.  There is never any question about what a BASI-trained teacher is, or is not, qualified to teach.

There is also a financial dimension. With BASI you know what the cost of the course is right up front; there are no additional requirements or supplementary costs. Compare the cost of our one, comprehensive course with the cumulative costs of all the courses you have to take at other institutes to achieve a similar level of expertise. Youâll be amazed at how reasonable our price really is.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
This course is designed to meet the growing demand for Pilates teachers specializing in mat work. Many locations do not have access to Pilates apparatus, yet see the enormous potential of the method. Offering the Mat work is a perfect solution.
It is affordable, easy to integrate into many different settings and introduces people to the foundation of Pilates. There is no part of the Pilates system that exemplifies the principles of the method, particularly flow, quite as well as the Mat work. Students study the full complement of Mat Work exercises and the integration of small apparatus into the Mat program. 

BASI encourages students who master this program to use it as a springboard to the Comprehensive Teacher Training Program.

data.name: Wellcoaches
data.about:
We train the best health & wellness coaches in the world. Our training is high-impact, evidence-based, and innovative. Our community of coaches are game-changers in their industries, from clinical, to corporate, government, and consumer well-being.

Why Become a Coach?
As a Certified WellcoachÂ® you become an expert facilitator of mindset and behavior change that generates sustainable healthy lifestyles, which prevent or treat disease, and foster well-being and thriving. You can impact some of the toughest challenges of our times: epidemics of obesity, diabetes, sedentary lifestyles, poor nutrition, chronic stress, distracted minds, and ever-rising healthcare costs.

Wellcoaches Mission
Cultivating world-class coaches who help people rise above the barriers to good health and thriving by making lasting changes in mindset and behavior. 

What Does Wellcoaches Offer?
We offer an extraordinary Core Coach Training Program that integrates the best of coaching science with rich practical experience. The design of our Core Coach Training Program helped set national standards and certification of health and wellness coaches, launching in 2016. Our Certification Program, which follows the Core Coach Training, offers two pathways to certification: the "Certified Health and Wellness Coach" for the health professional and the "Certified Personal Coach" for the non-health professional.

certifications.title: Certified Professional Health and Wellness Coach

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
We have built an innovative and robust coaching model we call the Onward & Upwardâ¢ model designed to enable professional health and wellness coaches to help clients optimize both mental and physical well-being. The need for coaching skills is compelling given that only 20% of adults are flourishing today by two independent and validated measures. More and more evidence is emerging to show that mental flourishing improves physical health which provides the basis for health and wellness coaches helping clients envision and achieve life goals that allow them to flourish and thrive physically and mentally.
The experiential workshops provide many fun, engaging, and transformational tools and exercises that you can use in your own workshops. The training topics delivered in teleclasses and workshops cover many evidence-based domains and their translation and integration in innovative ways into coaching principles, tools, and skills. We deliver a broad and deep approach to a variety of types goals that support outgrowing of old lifestyles â including performance, skills development, behavior change, and psychological skills.

We deliver introductory training in Bob Kegan and Lisa Laheyâs âImmunity to Changeâ program which is an elegantly succinct model of cognitive behavioral coaching â helping coaches help clients identify and overcome âhiddenâ or unconscious dysfunctional patterns â allowing coaches to work with clients with challenging life situations.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Wellcoaches Core Health and Wellness Coach Certification

Description
attrs.value:
Looking for a new career in healthcare? Become a healthcare leader and train to become a Certified Health & Wellness Coach!  

Our coach school was an industry first to be endorsed by the American College of Sports Medicine. We specialize in supporting health and wellness professionals in:

-Understanding human behavior change 
-Leveraging the science of Positive Psychology so clients flourish and thrive 
-Utilizing Motivational Interviewing techiniques which support a client in uncovering intrinsic motivation 
-Overcoming the resistance to change and uncovering self-efficacy 

All of our coach training programs are drawn from our work in developing the core coaching competencies explored fully in the Lippincott, Williams, & Wilkins Coaching Psychology Manual.

data.name: Nia
data.about: Nia is a sensory-based movement practice that leads to health, wellness and fitness. It draws from disciplines of the martial arts, dance arts and healing arts. Every class offers a unique combination of 52 moves that correspond with the main areas of the body: the base, the core and the upper extremities. Stiff beginners and highly fit athletes alike can adapt Nia to meet their needs by choosing from three intensity levels. Consecutive trainings collectively explore 52 principles for personal enrichment and professional development.
