Holy Yoga (HY)
data.about:
Holy Yoga is the intentional practice of connecting our entire being, body, mind and spirit with God: the Father, Son and Holy Spirit. With complete reliance on God's Word and prayer, Holy Yoga invites us to surrender and introduces us to Grace. When we breathe and move and have our being in Christ, we find ourselves in the flow of His magnificence. There is often a misunderstanding that yoga is a religion; it is not. Yoga is a spiritual discipline, much like prayer, fasting and meditation. Yoga has the capacity to enhance our personal beliefs and faith.

We practice with our minds set on whatever is true, noble, right, pure, lovely, admirable, excellent or praiseworthy (Phil 4:8), not with our minds emptied. We meditate on the wisdom of God's Word (Psalm 119:9-16, 26-27), not on man's wisdom. We seek the transcendence and glory of God, not our own.

certifications.title: 95 Hour Holy Yoga Instructor Training Program

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Holy Yoga offers a 95 hour Instructor Training program that will not only add to the 200-hour training you have already received through other programs, but will also teach you how to usher your students into the presence of God on their mats.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Pre-Natal Holy Yoga provides a unique opportunity for pregnant women to celebrate and bond with the amazing gift of life in their unborn baby by inviting God into their mother/child relationship through physical worship. It also helps to prepare the body, mind and spirit for the elements of birth and delivery. Post-Natal Holy Yoga is beneficial for while the body is in process of recovering from birth and helps mothers ease back into their yoga practices.

The Holy Yoga for Pregnancy/Postpartum is a 20-hour training program, and graduates obtain accreditation as a Registered Pre-/Post-Natal Holy Yoga Instructor. This training occurs as a 4-week home study program, which includes weekly webinar meetings, instructional videos, individual journaling and practice with the material presented, required reading, community participation and a student teaching practicum. (Your training materials will include the Pre-Natal Holy Yoga & Back Care DVD).

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Trauma-Sensitive Holy Yoga Training is a 35-hour training for already certified Holy Yoga Instructors and is led by a trained mental health professional. It provides education for understanding the effects that trauma has on the body and how the body can hold onto traumatic memories in very tangible ways. Students explore yoga postures that help facilitate healing from traumatic memories to guide students through the journey of reconnecting to the body in a safe way. The Trauma-Sensitive Holy Yoga training equips instructors to walk others through physiological recovery from traumatic memories by applying different techniques to appropriately manage the symptoms of a trauma survivor. Students also study how Scripture addresses trauma and the ways in which Godâs love and grace provide what is needed to safely explore the parts of the body that have felt stunted by traumatic experiences.

data.name: Systems of Smart Movement - Barre | Suspend | Reform (SSM)
data.about:
Systems of Smart Movement (SSM)


We provide instructor training in innovative cross-disciplinary exercise modalities that emphasize the beauty and the Art of Smart MovementÂ®.   The three day trainings are aimed to inspire and invigorate the teacher, to deepen their own personal practice and to expand their knowledge base of biomechanics with a structured syllabus that truly promotes the Art of Smart MovementÂ®.

 

What is Smat Movement?

Smart MovementÂ® is exercise that is efficient, not wasteful.  It is constructive, not destructive.  It is informed, purposeful, precise, artful and  well balanced!

 

Core Barre, Core Suspend & Core Reform make up the tripod of the Systems of Smart MovementÂ® and offer intelligent and exciting programming choices for both small and large group settings as well as private instruction.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
This 3-day course is the foundation course for CORE BARRE instructor certification.
The CORE BARRE System of Smart MovementÂ® is a group based exercise program that combines elements of Pilates mat, classical ballet, resistance training and active isolated stretching (AIS).
This course is designed to provide movement professionals with a firm base in the syllabus and biomechanics used in CORE BARRE classes. This course is for individuals who want to teach a solid execution of stabilization principles, movement concepts, ballet terminology and the complete knowledge of the Smart MovementÂ® syllabus combined with practice teaching and guidelines for effective cuing.

attrs.value: This 3-day course is the foundation course for CORE BARRE instructor certification.  The CORE BARRE System of Smart MovementÂ® is
